articles.title: Tom Brady roasts Logan Paul, calls wrestler’s athletic abilities ‘cute’
articles.description:
Tom Brady wanted Logan Paul to know that there are levels to athletic greatness. Both Paul and Brady are set to compete in the Fanatics Flag Football Classic in Saudi Arabia next month. Paul decided to talk some trash while Brady was on set for his “IMPAULSIVE” podcast. Brady gave it right back to him. […]

The post Tom Brady roasts Logan Paul, calls wrestler’s athletic abilities ‘cute’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tom Brady and Logan Paul will compete in the Fanatics Flag Football Classic in Saudi Arabia next month.
Brady responded to Paul's trash talk during an episode of the 'IMPAULSIVE' podcast.
Boston residents can expect increased media attention on local sports personalities like Brady.

articles.title: Trump’s EPA revokes scientific finding that underpinned US fight against climate change
articles.description:
The rule finalized by the Environmental Protection Agency rescinds a 2009 government declaration known as the endangerment finding that determined that carbon dioxide and other greenhouse gases endanger public health and welfare.

The post Trump’s EPA revokes scientific finding that underpinned US fight against climate change appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: EPA revokes 2009 endangerment finding on greenhouse gases, impacting climate policy.
This decision affects Boston's air quality and public health initiatives.
Local environmental groups may face challenges in advocating for climate action.
